XIV.8.3.d
.
Circumstances Under Which It Is Appropriate to Contact OIG
It is appropriate for an RO to contact OIG for advice when
the RO is experiencing difficulty
obtaining information from a law enforcement agency, or
making sense of information it received, or
a beneficiary (or apportionee, if applicable) admits there was a valid felony warrant but
reports they (or a dependent, if applicable) never received notice of the warrant, or
alleges there are other extenuating circumstances that prevented clearing of the warrant.
Notes
:
The OIG corporate mailbox
for PMCs
is
OIG51FugitiveFelonHQ@va.gov
.  Only PMCs may contact the OIG corporate mailbox directly, by e-mail.  When they do, they must include P&F Service (
VAVBAWAS/CO/P&F TNG QUAL OVRST
) in the Cc line.
VSCs/BESTs must follow the instructions in
M21-1, Part XIV, 8.3.e
, for contacting the OIG corporate mailbox.
